entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lillooet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lillooet 5:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow level rising to 600 metres near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning late in the evening. Snow level 600 metres lowering to valley bottom late in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
